## Plan a Gift

## Leave a Gift for  
Future Generations

Plan a gift and join the visionary donors who pledge to invest in the future of Confederation Centre of the Arts by leaving a gift in your will or donating a life insurance policy. The plans you make now can help the Centre thrive in the future!

A bequest – a provision in your will or estate plan designating assets to the Centre – doesn’t impact your finances today and will make a world of difference in generations to come. Make a gift without affecting your financial security. You may even be able to make a larger donation than otherwise possible.

Or consider donating a life insurance policy to Confederation Centre of the Arts. A donated life insurance policy isn’t subject to taxes, probate costs, or estate debts, and you can make a substantial contribution through relatively small monthly or yearly payments.

**Talk to your financial advisor today about planned giving!**

## A World-Class Destination for Live Theatre and the Arts

From captivating theatre and exhilarating dance to unforgettable music and side-splitting comedy, Confederation Centre of the Arts brings a world-class lineup of live performances to Charlottetown year-round. As the proud home of the Charlottetown Festival—the largest and most celebrated theatre festival in Atlantic Canada—the Centre stands at the heart of Canada’s cultural capital of the East Coast. Experience the magic of storytelling, artistry, and creativity that makes Charlottetown one of the premier theatre destinations in the world.
